_header: I have great marvel of a bird
_description: On an unfaithful mistress — in 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) with refrain, ‘alas þat euer sho was unkynd’

Lincoln133.First Lines:
I haue grete maruell off a brydThat with my luff ys went a
                    wayShe byldes hyr in a noþer stedTher ffore I more both nyght
                    & day…
Lincoln133.Last Lines:
…A las þat euer sho was vnkyndA las qui ys þat bryd
                    [ ][ ] I went [ ] luff [ ]
Lincoln133.Note:
18 lines, added to the last leaf of the MS by a later hand; ends
                    imperfectly (torn).
